travel.title: Turkish Travel as an Advanced example
travel.content: Experience the magic of modern design implemented with seamless simplicity for amazing customers navigation. The advanced and responsive UI design showcases the contemporary approach to Website Development, with SEO optimization and translation support for Arabic, English, and Turkish languages.
travel.author: VIMA Team

beauty.title: Basic Plan for a Beauty Salon
beauty.content: Elegantly designed landing page showcasing the main advantages of your business including services, pricing and google maps widget. A graceful demonstration of one-page Website development, showcasing responsive design principles. Clean and well-structured design ensures optimization for client conversion.
beauty.author: VIMA Team

premium.title: Premium Website Solution
premium.content: Premium implementation of a comprehensive Web Application with multiple pages handling SEO with metadata and hrefs translation, showcasing Web Development excellence. Featuring modern and responsive design, seamless user experience across all devices, and integrated AI Chatbot capabilities for enhanced navigation and engaging user experience. The chatbot is equipped with personalized data, wrapped in a user-friendly interface and is ready to provide instant answers to user inquiries. Ultimate choise for businesses seeking cutting-edge technology and exceptional user experience.
premium.author: VIMA Team

basic.title: Basic Plan
basic.features: Initial Consultation|Design and production|Hosting on your own server|Simple website design|2 Languages

advanced.title: Advanced Plan
advanced.features: Ready to go solution|3 FREE updates per year|1 year FREE server included|SEO with 3 FREE blog posts per year|Better digital presence|Advanced website design|3 Languages

vip.title: Premium Plan
vip.features: Everything in Advanced PLUS|Premium domain included|Unlimited update requests|AI Chatbot Integration|Superior website design|User authentication|2 years hosting|Up to 5 Languages
